channel.title: Changing attack speed and ranging doesn't work?
channel.description:
Hey all, why is my attack speed so slow???It attacks like the normal runescape speed and it sucks balls!
How do i change that?
Also, whenever i try to kill something with a bow, it says no arrows left in quiver or keeps hitting 0's...So i get arrows and it says the same thing, and i'm still hitting 0's!!!!
HELP!!!
lol any help would be good.
Cheers!

item.title: Changing attack speed and ranging doesn't work?
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

[quote=“lilporky, post:1, topic:68623”]Hey all, why is my attack speed so slow???It attacks like the normal runescape speed and it sucks balls!

How do i change that?

Also, whenever i try to kill something with a bow, it says no arrows left in quiver or keeps hitting 0’s…So i get arrows and it says the same thing, and i’m still hitting 0’s!!!

HELP!!!

lol any help would be good.

Cheers![/quote]
for attack timings see the tut section, it might be related to weapon timers.
